title: New: Zomby – Things Fall Apart (feat. Panda Bear)
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/zombydef.jpg "zombydef")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7475-new-zomby-%e2%80%93-things-fall-apart-feat-panda-bear/attachment/zombydef)

With the news that **Zomby** has signed to **4AD**, as well as the arrival of a new LP around with corner, **4AD** have decided to release a tune from the record. Featuring the high profile collaboration with **Panda Bear**, it makes for a rather striking clash of styles. Check it out bellow.

[Zomby – Things Fall Apart (feat. Panda Bear)](http://soundcloud.com/factmag/zomby-things-fall-apart-feat) by [factmag](http://soundcloud.com/factmag)
